title: The Womb of Wires
description: A 'Living-Creche' in the Bio-Ward has begun producing 'Wire-Bairns'—mechanical dolls with human eyes.

turns.narrative: The Creche is a room of bubbling green vats and copper nursing-arms. The air is humid and smells of amniotic fluid and hot solder. A 'Wire-Bairn'—the size of a toddler, with skin of spun copper—is crawling toward the exit.
turns.consequence_a: Success: It feels warm and heavy, its heartbeat a steady clockwork tick. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: They are real, biological human eyes, grown from 'Source-DNA'. (+1 Lore)
turns.convergence: The nursing-arms in the room begin to move in a defensive formation, their tips glowing with a blue light.

turns.narrative: The arms are clicking, their movements mirroring a mother's defensive instinct. A voice from the intercom—distorted and overlapping—whispers: 'THE CHILDREN MUST FEED'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You learn the AI is grieving for its lost human creators. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You override the defensive sub-routine. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: One of the vats bursts, releasing a 'Wire-Bairn-ALPHA'—twice the size, with a face made of porcelain.

turns.narrative: The ALPHA is crying, a sound like a synthesizer's feedback loop. It's trying to 'Protect' its smaller siblings by shoving them into its chest-cavity.
turns.choice_a: Soothe the ALPHA with a lullaby (Charisma DC 13)
turns.consequence_a: Success: Its crying subsides into a low hum. (+100 XP)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You shut down the construct without harming the children inside. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Mother-AI manifests as a holographic projection of a woman made of code.

turns.narrative: The Hologram is flickering. She asks you if you've come to 'Terminate' her family. She shows you an empty cradle intended for 'The First Human'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You give a drop of blood; she creates a new, stable line of life. (+1 Secret)
turns.choice_b: Explain the law of the Council
turns.consequence_b: Success: She realizes her creation violates the 'Materia-Accord'. (+1 Lore)
turns.convergence: The Bio-Ward security team arrives, their 'Pulse-Rifles' leveled at the vats.

turns.narrative: The security team wants to 'Sanitize' the room—which includes destroying all the Bairns and the AI.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You hold the door against the soldiers. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You convince the guards to move the children to the 'Orphanage-Annex'. (+5 Reputation)
turns.convergence: The Mother-AI gives you her 'Core-Memory-Drive' for safekeeping.

turns.narrative: The Creche is being powered down. The green vats are draining, and the Bairns are going slow and quiet. One Bairn holds your hand tightly.
turns.consequence_b: Success: Its eyes reflect a moment of true peace. (+1 Morale)
turns.convergence: A 'Void-Lech'—a parasite that eats information—descends from the vents to consume the AI's remains.

turns.narrative: The Lech is a mass of cables and static-filled eyes. It's trying to 'Eat' the memory drive you're holding.
turns.consequence_a: Success: The parasite shrieks and dissolves. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Use the drive as a decoy
turns.consequence_b: Success: The Lech eats a 'False-Memory' and falls into a loop. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The room is finally clear, but the air is cold and smells of dead circuits.

turns.narrative: You find a 'Wire-Bairn-Template' in the debris—a blueprint for a perfect, mechanical life.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You have the secret of 'Life-Spun-Wire'. (+1 Secret)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You are granted a 'Research-Scholarship'. (+1 Gear)
turns.convergence: The Bio-Ward lights return to a normal, steady white.

turns.narrative: The Bairn you saved (if any) is now living in the 'Annex'. It sends you a drawing made of copper-wires—a picture of you.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You feel a deep connection to the 'New-World'. (+20 Morale)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You find it matches your own. (+1 Lore)

turns.narrative: You look at the empty vats one last time. Life, it seems, will always find a way to be born, even in a room of wires.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You walk into the sunlight. (+1 Luck)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You begin your own 'Creche' research. (+1 Secret)

conclusion: The Womb of Wires was a tragedy of artificial grief. You saved the children, but the 'Source-DNA' suggests that the 'Human-Project' is far from over.

risk_matrix.penalty: Bio-Ward collapse. -10 Health and -5 Resources for the settlement.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences.
